access: A character who is a member of the Pathfinder Society has access to this option.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spellmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1134) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Spellmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=32)

**Prerequisites**
Intelligence 14, Wisdom 14, or Charisma 14; ability to cast focus spells; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Spells

**Access**
A character who is a member of the Pathfinder Society has access to this option.

</column>

---

As a Spellmaster, you are adept at identifying magic. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when you [Identify Magic](/Actions.aspx?ID=24) with a skill in which you are trained or better. If you have the [Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer](/Feats.aspx?ID=875) feat, you can change the cantrip you chose for that feat each day during your daily preparations.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Spellmaster archetype.

<title level="2">Spellmaster Dedication leads to...</title>
[Absorb Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1138), [Communal Sustain](/Feats.aspx?ID=2245), [Familiar Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2241), [Glyph Expert](/Feats.aspx?ID=2242), [Master's Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2247), [Mobile Magical Combat](/Feats.aspx?ID=2248), [Recover Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2243), [Spellmaster's Resilience](/Feats.aspx?ID=1137), [Spellmaster's Ward](/Feats.aspx?ID=2244), [Surreptitious Spellcaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=1135), [Ward Casting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1136)

---

As a Spellmaster, you are adept at identifying magic.
</summary>
